member.name: T:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel
member.summary: The class for Smartcard channel information. It allows applications to handle the channel information.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.IsBasicChannel
member.summary: Whether the kind of channel is basic.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.IsLogicalChannel
member.summary: Whether the kind of channel is logical.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.IsClosed
member.summary: Whether the channel is closed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.Session
member.summary: The session that has opened the given channel.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.Finalize
member.summary: SmartcardChannel destructor.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.Close
member.summary: Closes the given channel to the Secure Element.
member.exception: Thrown when the Smartcard is not supported.
Thrown when the method failed due to an invalid operation.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.GetSelectedResponse
member.summary: Gets the response to the select command.
member.returns: Byte array to retrieve the select response.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.Transmit(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Transmits the APDU command (as per ISO/IEC 7816-4) to the secure element.
member.returns: Byte array for the response APDU plus status words.
member.param: Command APDU to be sent to the secure element.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.GetTransmittedResponse
member.summary: Helper function to retrieve the response APDU of the previous transmit() call.
member.returns: Byte array for the response APDU plus status words.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardChannel.SelectNext
member.summary: Performs a selection of the next applet on the given channel that matches to the partial application ID (AID).
member.returns: True or false depending whether another applet with the partial application ID (AID).

member.name: T:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardManager
member.summary: The class for Smartcard management. It allows applications to use the Smartcard service.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardManager.GetReaders
member.summary: Gets the list of available secure element readers.

member.name: T:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader
member.summary: The class for Smartcard reader information. It allows applications to handle the reader information.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader.Name
member.summary: The name of the reader.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader.IsSecureElementPresent
member.summary: The existence of a secure element.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader.Finalize
member.summary: SmartcardReader destructor.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader.OpenSession
member.summary: Connects to a secure element in the given reader.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardReader.CloseSessions
member.summary: Closes all the sessions opened on the given reader.
member.exception: Thrown when the Smartcard is not supported.
Thrown when the method failed due to an invalid operation.

member.name: T:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession
member.summary: The class for the Smartcard session information. It allows applications to handle the session information.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.Reader
member.summary: The reader object that provides the given session.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.Atr
member.summary: The Answer to Reset (ATR) of this secure element.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.IsClosed
member.summary: Whether the session is closed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.Finalize
member.summary: SmartcardSession destructor.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.Close
member.summary: Closes the connection with the secure element.
member.exception: Thrown when the Smartcard is not supported.
Thrown when the method failed due to invalid operation.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.CloseChannels
member.summary: Closes any channel opened on the given session.
member.exception: Thrown when the Smartcard is not supported.
Thrown when the method failed due to an invalid operation.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.OpenBasicChannel(System.Byte[],System.Byte)
member.summary: Gets an access to the basic channel, as defined in the ISO/IEC 7816-4 specification (the one that has number 0).
member.returns: The SmartcardChannel object for the basic channel.
member.param: The byte array containing the Application ID(AID) to be selected on the given channel.
P2 byte of the SELECT command if executed.
member.exception: Thrown when the Smartcard is not supported.
Thrown when the method failed due to invalid operation.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.Smartcard.SmartcardSession.OpenLogicalChannel(System.Byte[],System.Byte)
member.summary: Open a logical channel with the secure element, selecting the Applet represented by the given application ID (AID).
member.returns: The SmartcardChannel object for the logical channel.
member.param: The byte array containing the Application ID(AID) to be selected on the given channel.
P2 byte of the SELECT command if executed.
member.exception: Thrown when the Smartcard is not supported.
Thrown when the method failed due to an invalid operation.
